name: The Hero's incredible Chronicles
description:
The adventure is waiting for you!

Play as the Hero and come to the end of riddles, fearsome enemies, and discover the most incredible story of video game in a gigantic open world.

 ------------------------------------------

This game has been presented to the game jam contest Ludum Dare #42 with he imposed topic "Running out of Space".

>> Go to the LudumDare Entry

Enjoy !

 ------------------------------------------

Music credits : Warrior by Filip Lackovic
